tombstone.block.decorative_grave.desc: Decorative Graves are used for praying with an Ankh and are sometimes haunted by souls allowing the practice of magic
block.tombstone.thornveil.desc: Blooming from gravebound silence, it awakens the edges of memory
tombstone.item.scroll_buff.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul to enchant
tombstone.item.scroll_buff.use2: Hold right click to cast this spell
tombstone.item.grave_key.desc1: Allows you to see your grave at a distance
tombstone.item.grave_key.desc2: Allows you to teleport to your grave
tombstone.item.grave_key.desc3: Recover your lost items by right clicking on your grave or sneaking over it
tombstone.item.grave_key.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul for teleportation
tombstone.item.grave_key.use2: Hold right click to teleport to your grave
tombstone.item.scroll_of_knowledge.desc1: Allows you to store your experience (%d%% will be lost in the transfer)
tombstone.item.scroll_of_knowledge.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul to store your experience
tombstone.item.scroll_of_knowledge.use2: Hold right click to receive this knowledge
tombstone.item.tablet_of_recall.desc: Allows you to teleport to a memorized location
tombstone.item.tablet_of_recall.desc_anc: All the creatures around you will also be teleported
tombstone.item.tablet_of_recall.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul to link
tombstone.item.tablet_of_recall.use2: Sneak near a decorative grave to change the memorized location
tombstone.item.tablet_of_home.desc: Allows you to teleport to your respawn point
tombstone.item.tablet_of_home.desc_ancie: All the creatures around you will also be teleported
tombstone.item.tablet_of_home.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul to enchant
tombstone.item.tablet_of_assistance.desc: Allows you to teleport to another player
Invite the players to join you
tombstone.item.tablet_of_assistance.use_: Hold right click to call for help
tombstone.item.tablet_of_assistance.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul to enchant
tombstone.item.tablet_of_assistance.use3: Hold right click to teleport to the player with the engraved name
tombstone.item.tablet_of_cupidity.desc: Can bring you fortune, even if few have returned
tombstone.item.tablet_of_cupidity.desc_a: The item looks safer to use
tombstone.item.tablet_of_cupidity.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul to enchant
tombstone.item.tablet_of_guard.desc: Invoke a spectral wolf to protect the place for a short time
tombstone.item.tablet_of_guard.desc_anci: Invoke a spectral wolf to protect the place for a long time
tombstone.item.tablet_of_guard.use1: Right click on a Grave Soul to enchant
tombstone.item.fishing_rod_of_misadventu: Right click on a Grave Soul to enchant
The grave magic makes this fishing rod faster and unbreakable
tombstone.item.lost_tablet.desc1: This tablet must have possessed a great power long ago
tombstone.item.lost_tablet.desc2: Seems to depict a distant place
tombstone.item.lost_tablet.desc3: Allows you to teleport to this mysterious place
tombstone.item.lost_tablet.use1: Needs time for its magic to awaken
tombstone.item.lost_tablet.use2: Right click on a Grave Soul to provide teleportation
tombstone.item.lost_tablet.use3: Hold right click to teleport to this place
tombstone.item.receptacle_of_soul.desc1: A soul is trapped in this magical container
tombstone.item.receptacle_of_soul.desc2: The magic of this item prevents you from dying when in your inventory
tombstone.item.receptacle_of_soul.use: Right click a decorative grave to bind the soul
tombstone.item.receptacle_of_familiar.de: This receptacle allows to capture the soul of one of your dead familiars
The receptacle contains the soul of a creature: %s
tombstone.item.receptacle_of_familiar.us: The imprisoned soul must recover by absorbing some of your vital essence
Right click on a Grave Soul to bring back to life your familiar
tombstone.item.voodoo_poppet.use1: Right-click on a grave soul to activate protection
tombstone.item.book_of_disenchantment.de: Can strip some enchantments from an item and return them as books
tombstone.item.book_of_disenchantment.us: Right click on a Grave Soul with this book in the offhand and an enchanted item in the mainhand
tombstone.item.book_of_recycling.desc: Can recycle an item to obtain its crafting ingredients
tombstone.item.book_of_recycling.use: Right click on a Grave Soul with this book in the offhand and an item to recycle in the mainhand
tombstone.item.book_of_repairing.use: Right click on a Grave Soul with this book in the offhand and an item to repair in the mainhand
tombstone.item.book_of_scribe.desc: Can magically create multiple copies of a magic scroll
tombstone.item.book_of_scribe.use: Right click on a Grave Soul with this book in the offhand and a scroll to copy in the mainhand
tombstone.item.book_of_magic_impregnatio: Right click on a Grave Soul with this book in the offhand and an enchantable item in the mainhand
tombstone.item.book_of_soulbound.use: Right click on a Grave Soul with this book in the offhand and a non stackable item in the mainhand
tombstone.item.book_of_oblivion.use: Right click on a Grave Soul with this book in the offhand
tombstone.item.ankh_of_prayer.desc: Allows you to pray for your soul on graves
tombstone.item.ankh_of_prayer.use1: It doesn't appear to be the right time to pray %s
tombstone.item.ankh_of_prayer.use2: Hold right click near a decorative grave to pray
tombstone.item.bone_needle.desc: Create a bind with a kind of creature to be used in magic practices
tombstone.item.bone_needle.use: Right click a creature to impregnate the bone needle
tombstone.item.christmas_gift.desc:
This gift has appeared mysteriously and doesn't seem to want to open.
A message is written there: "Cannot be opened before December 25."
tombstone.item.christmas_gift.use: Find a way to open this gift
tombstone.item.villager_gift.desc: This gift will not be delivered on time if no one takes care of bringing it near the villager's bed
tombstone.item.villager_gift.use1: Reach the faraway place where a village should be
tombstone.item.villager_gift.use2: Right click the bed to hide the Villager Gift to be rewarded for your efforts
tombstone.item.seeker_rod.desc: A slightly special rod guiding you to places holding secret knowledges
tombstone.item.seeker_rod.use1: The rod has revealed a distant place to you to reach
tombstone.item.seeker_rod.use2: Use the rod to that place to receive the reward
tombstone.item.christmas_hat.desc: A strange hat that brings good luck and slightly increase your running speed
tombstone.item.gift.desc: Reward received by completing advancements in Corail Tombstone
tombstone.item.gift.use: Right click to reveal the content
tombstone.item.bag_of_seeds.use: Right click to reveal the content
tombstone.item.smoke_ball.desc: Has no use except producing smoke
tombstone.item.gemstone_of_familiar.desc: Theses rare magic gemstones allow to bring back to life your last dead familiar
tombstone.item.gemstone_of_familiar.use: Hold right click to revive your familiar
tombstone.item.gemstone_of_merchant.desc: Theses rare magic gemstones allow to obtain better exchanges with a merchant
tombstone.item.gemstone_of_merchant.use: Hold right click on a merchant
tombstone.item.gemstone_of_prayer.desc: Theses rare magic gemstones allow to reset your Ankh ability
tombstone.item.gemstone_of_prayer.use: Hold right click to reset your Ankh
tombstone.item.gemstone_of_guardian.desc: Theses rare magic gemstones allow to invoke a Grave Guardian
tombstone.item.ritual_flute.desc: The Watchers did not always need words: their flutes guided the rituals where only memory could sing
tombstone.item.ritual_flute.use: Right click to play a melody
tombstone.tooltip.in_beta: This item is in beta; feedback is welcome
tombstone.gui.ritual_flute.title: Ritual Flute
tombstone.message.impregnate_duration: The essence of the creature will vanish in %s

tombstone.message.choose_no_grave: You chosen to have no grave

tombstone.message.new_grave: A new grave with your lost items was created

tombstone.message.lost_tablet.wake_up.fa: The Lost Tablet broke into dust

bonus.tombstone.pray_of_protection: Can protect villagers and golems from a future death
bonus.tombstone.pray_of_empathy.title: Pray of Empathy
bonus.tombstone.pray_of_empathy: Can encourage a creature to become one of your familiars
bonus.tombstone.pray_of_harmonization: Strengthens and encourages a creature to become one of your familiars
bonus.tombstone.pray_of_dissonance.title: Prayer of Dissonance
bonus.tombstone.pray_of_dissonance: Strengthens and controls an humanoid undead to become one of your familiars
bonus.tombstone.zombify: Can convert villagers to zombie-villagers by using the Ankh
bonus.tombstone.exorcism.title: Exorcism
bonus.tombstone.exorcism: Can convert zombie-villagers to villagers by using the Ankh
bonus.tombstone.pray_of_undead.title: Pray of Undead
bonus.tombstone.pray_of_undead: Can control humanoid undead by using the Ankh
bonus.tombstone.enhanced_grave_prayer: Improves your prayers on graves by providing a beneficial effect to all nearby allies
bonus.tombstone.rite_of_silent_bond: Access to a rite that makes the undeads consider you one of their own unless you attack them
bonus.tombstone.rite_of_coral_chant: Access to a rite that lets you feel just as at ease beneath the waves as on land
bonus.tombstone.rite_of_remanence.title: Rite of Remanence
bonus.tombstone.rite_of_remanence: Access to a rite that increases your experience gains
description.effect.tombstone.ghostly_sha: Ghostly appearance received after a death
description.effect.tombstone.preservatio: Preserves experience and beneficial effects on death
description.effect.tombstone.unstable_in: Prevents damage for a full second every five seconds
description.effect.tombstone.true_sight: Lets you see in the dark, in the fog and underwater
description.effect.tombstone.reach: Increases the range to hit creatures or to harvest
description.effect.tombstone.lightning_r: Reduces damage taken by lightning by 75%
description.effect.tombstone.frost_resis: Reduces damage taken by frost by 75%
description.effect.tombstone.aquatic_lif: Allows to move freely and breathe in the water
description.effect.tombstone.bone_shield: Protects against melee damages and reflects a part
description.effect.tombstone.prayer: Received when a prayer is cast on the target
description.effect.tombstone.discretion: Improves stealth speed and reduces range detection
description.effect.tombstone.mercy: Share beneficial effects among nearby allies
description.effect.tombstone.weaver_walk: Allows you to move quickly over cobwebs
description.effect.tombstone.giant_stren: Your strength increases as well as your height
description.effect.tombstone.little_worl: Your height decreases and makes you faster
description.effect.tombstone.decrepitude: Reduces health by a percentage over time
description.effect.tombstone.projectile_: Reflects the projectiles to their owner
description.effect.tombstone.beyond_the_: The undead consider you as one of their own
description.effect.minecraft.jump_boost: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage
description.effect.minecraft.water_breat: Allows to breathe underwater and prevents drowning
description.effect.minecraft.blindness: Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit
description.effect.minecraft.night_visio: Lets the player see well in darkness and underwater
description.effect.minecraft.poison: Inflicts damage over time (but can't kill)
description.effect.minecraft.absorption: Damage absorption (extra hearts cannot be regenerated)
description.effect.minecraft.glowing: Makes entities glow making them visible through blocks
description.effect.minecraft.luck: Can increase chances of high-quality and more loot
description.effect.minecraft.unluck: Can reduce chances of high-quality and more loot
description.effect.minecraft.slow_fallin: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage
description.effect.minecraft.conduit_pow: Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning
description.effect.minecraft.bad_omen: Triggers an illager raid by entering a village
description.effect.minecraft.hero_of_the: Villagers offer you items depending on their profession and discounted prices on their trades
enchantment.tombstone.spectral_bite.desc: chance to trigger an area attack when hit
enchantment.tombstone.magic_siphon.desc: absorbs beneficial effects from enemies hit
enchantment.tombstone.plague_bringer.des: applies negative effects to enemies hit
enchantment.tombstone.curse_of_bones.des: chance to reflect damage when hit
enchantment.tombstone.blessing.desc: chance to receive a beneficial effect when hit
chance to conjure a Spectral Wolf when hit
enchantment.tombstone.incurable_wounds.d: reduces healing done to enemies hit
enchantment.tombstone.decrepitude.desc: reduces the health of enemies hit by a percentage over time
enchantment.tombstone.sanctified.desc: deals holy damage and slightly regenerates health on hitting
tombstone.perk.jailer.bonus: chance to get an enchanted key on death
tombstone.perk.jailer.disabled: config chance_enchanted_grave_key is set to a value <= 0
tombstone.perk.rune_inscriber.bonus: chance to not consume a tablet use
tombstone.perk.archaeologist.desc: increases the chances of finding special items
tombstone.perk.archaeologist.bonus: chance to get structures with Lost Tablets
tombstone.perk.treasure_seeker.desc: increases the chances of finding special items
tombstone.perk.witch_doctor.bonus: chance to not be consumed on death prevention
tombstone.perk.necromancer.desc: improves Zombify and Pray of Undead
tombstone.perk.necromancer.bonus: chance that controlled undead will become spellcasters
tombstone.perk.priest.desc: chance for the Ankh of Prayer not to be on cooldown

tombstone.configuration.title: Corail Tombstone Configuration
tombstone.config_cat.client.tooltip: Personal Options that can be edited even on server
Decimal value for the color of the particles when using magic items
tombstone.config.fog_color.tooltip: Decimal value for the color of the fog
tombstone.config.show_magic_circle.toolt: Shows the magic circles when using some items
Shows all the infos in the tooltip of items
tombstone.config.highlight.tooltip: Highlights the tomb from far when holding the key
Allows the ghost to appear around you during Halloween
tombstone.config.text_color_death_date.t: Decimal value for the color of the grave text <Death Date>
tombstone.config.text_color_rip.tooltip: Decimal value for the color of the grave text <R.I.P.>
tombstone.config.text_color_owner.toolti: Decimal value for the color of the grave text <Owner Name>
tombstone.config.date_in_mc_time.tooltip: Shows only the elapsed minecraft days since the death on graves
tombstone.config.display_knowledge_messa: Display or not the messages of gain of points in knowledge of death
tombstone.config.display_alignment_messa: Display or not the messages of earned points in Alignment
tombstone.config.equip_elytra_in_priorit: Equips elytra in priority when recovering your lost items
tombstone.config.equip_shield_in_priorit: Equips shields in priority when recovering your lost items
tombstone.config.reverse_inventory_sorti: Sorts the inventory by filling the last slots first
tombstone.config.show_info_on_enchantmen: Shows the use of the Tombstone enchantments in tooltip
tombstone.config.grave_skin_rule.tooltip: Defines the rule to use for grave skin
tombstone.config.priorize_tool_on_hotbar: Favor the tools on the hotbar when recovering a grave
tombstone.config.activate_grave_by_sneak: Allows to activate a grave by sneaking
tombstone.config.allow_grave_in_water.to: Allows your grave to appear in water
tombstone.config.auto_equip_rule.tooltip: Defines when to automatically equip your items
tombstone.config.marker_type.tooltip: Defines the type of marker when holding in hand some items like the Grave Key
tombstone.config.font_rule.tooltip: Defines the font to use in Tombstone screens (only for english, french and dutch languages)
tombstone.config.show_tooltip_combine.to: Display the combinations in item tooltip
tombstone.config.no_blinking_nightvision: Prevent night vision from flashing when less than 5 seconds left
tombstone.config.scale_guiscreens.toolti: Scales guiscreens to be larger as possible
tombstone.config_cat.village_siege.toolt: Allows to define the conditions for a village siege to begin
tombstone.config_cat.magic_item.tooltip: For settings related to magic items
tombstone.config_cat.potion.tooltip: Allows to customize or disable the potions
tombstone.config_cat.perk.tooltip: Allows to customize or disable the perks
tombstone.config_cat.decorative_grave.to: For settings related to decorative graves
tombstone.config_cat.enchantments.toolti: Allows to customize or disable the enchantments
tombstone.config_cat.recovery.tooltip: Options related to the command recovery and auto-save of players
tombstone.config_cat.allowed_magic_items: Allows to disable some magic items
tombstone.config_cat.compatibility.toolt: Allows to enable some features related to others mods
tombstone.command.tbteleport.default.usa:
This command is for teleportation, you need to select a type of teleport
/tbteleport <pos, player, grave, death, home, discovery, biome>
tombstone.command.tbteleport.discovery.u:
Teleports to an unexplored structure
/tbteleport discovery <entity> [structure] [dim]
tombstone.command.tbshowlastgrave.usage:
Shows the position of the last known grave of a player
/tbshowlastgrave [player]
tombstone.command.tbteleport.grave.usage:
Teleports to the last known grave of a player
/tbteleport grave [player] [playerGrave]
tombstone.command.tbteleport.home.usage:
Teleports to the respawn point of a player
/tbteleport home [player] [target]
tombstone.command.tbrestoreinventory.usa:
Restores the player inventory with the last known grave
/tbrestoreinventory [player]
tombstone.command.tbknowledge.usage:
Adjusts the Knowledge of Death of a player
/tbknowledge <player> <show|set|increase|decrease> <amount>
You can also reset the Ankh cooldown and Perks with /tbknowledge <player> <reset_ankh|reset_perks>
tombstone.command.tbalignment.usage:
Adjusts the Alignment of a player
/tbalignment <player> <show|set|increase|decrease> <amount>
tombstone.command.tbsiege.usage:
Launches or interrupt a village siege
/tbsiege <start|stop> [dim]
tombstone.command.tbrevivefamiliar.usage:
Revives the last dead familiar of a player
/tbrevivefamiliar <player>
tombstone.command.tbacceptteleport.usage: This command shouldn't be called manually
tombstone.command.tbrequestteleport.usag:
Send authorization request to teleport to another player
/tbrequestteleport <player>
tombstone.command.tbteleport.death.usage:
Teleports to your last death location
/tbteleport death
tombstone.compendium.intro:
The Compendium is a collection of information about Tombstone to help new players.
Each information is linked to several others in the right hand menu for a consistent reading.
tombstone.compendium.alignment.desc:
The alignment depends on the actions performed by the player.
Alignment increases:
- by using a Receptacle of Soul on a grave to free the soul
- by killing pillagers and zombies during a village siege
- by exorcising a zombie-villager with the Ankh of Prayer
- by protecting a villager with the Ankh of Prayer
- by using a Potion of Earthly Garden
Alignment decreases:
- by killing villagers
- by using a tablet of cupidity
- by plundering an abandoned player grave without the key
- by killing one of your tamed creatures
The citizens and raiders of Minecolonies are considered to be villagers and pillagers, respectively.
It can unlock some perks or allow to use some magical items.
Each level of alignment also reduces the damage done by undead / living creatures depending on your side of alignment.
The damage reduction does not affect those of others players.
tombstone.compendium.ankh_of_prayer.desc:
The Ankh of Prayer is an item allowing to earn Knowledge of Death but with a cooldown.
When the Ankh is usable, it can be used to pray near a Decorative Grave or on some creatures based on your alignment.
tombstone.compendium.bone_needle.desc:
The bone needle is a tool used to create a magical bind with a creature by capturing a small part of its essence.
The needle, once filled with this essence, can modify a Receptacle of Familiar to define the type of creature that can be captured.
tombstone.compendium.book_of_disenchantm:
The book can extract enchantments from an item when in contact with a Grave Soul.
The item to be disenchanted must be held in your right hand.
The Perk Scribe allows you to remove one more enchantment by level.
tombstone.compendium.book_of_recycling.d:
With the help of a Grave Soul, the book allows to recycle the pile of items in your other hand in order to collect its crafting ingredients.
The item to be recycled cannot be a container.
If any enchantments are present on this item, they will be lost.
tombstone.compendium.book_of_repairing.d: The book allows you to repair your items and erase the wear and tear left by non-magical methods.
tombstone.compendium.book_of_scribe.desc: The book allows you to magically create multiple copies of a magic scroll.
tombstone.compendium.book_of_magic_impre: The book allows you to enchant or strengthen the magic contained in certain enchantable items as well as arrows.
tombstone.compendium.book_of_soulbound.d: The book allows you to enchant an item with Soulbound allowing to keep it on you after death.
tombstone.compendium.book_of_oblivion.de: The book allows you to reset your Knowledge of Death Perks.
tombstone.compendium.combination.title: Combination
tombstone.compendium.combination.desc:
Some recipes are not used at the Crafting Table but by directly combining the ingredient on the item in the inventory (similar to the action of filling a bundle).
For example, you can enchant a Grave Key by combining on it an Ender Pearl.
You can view theses recipes by hovering the item to display the tooltip or by using a mod that displays the recipes like Just Enough Items.
tombstone.compendium.grave_marble.desc:
The Grave Marble is a crafting ingredient to build Decorative Graves.
It's also possible to craft White Marble by adding Bone Meal to the recipe.
The Grave Marble is really resistant to explosions.
tombstone.compendium.death.title: Die in Tombstone
tombstone.compendium.death.desc:
When a player dies, a grave is created containing all lost items.
The player reappears with the Grave Key allowing to teleport if enchanted, as well as a Ghostly Shape effect preventing creatures from attacking you.
The amount of experience lost is defined in the config and adjusted by the Perk Memento Mori by 20 %% per level allowing to reach 100 %%.
tombstone.compendium.decorative_grave.de:
Decorative Graves are special blocks that emit smoke at night.
They can be harvested with a pickaxe or shovel.
You can engrave them with a Memorial Plaque.
The Decorative Graves are sometimes haunted by a soul (defined by the config) that can be used to enchant certain magical items such as the Grave Key, Scrolls and Tablets.
The chance to have a soul on a decorative grave is not influenced if the chunk is unloaded.
tombstone.compendium.screaming_grave.des:
Screaming Graves appear when decorative graves accumulate too much corruption, caused by the excessive use of ancient rites or the improper use of grave souls.
Each grave has a corruption level that changes based on player actions.
Corruption decreases:
- over time (faster during the Spring Bloom)
- when prayers are performed at the grave
It increases:
- when certain items are enchanted using tomb souls
- when ancient rites are used intensively in a short period of time
- if a blue soul is partially used
When a grave exceeds a critical corruption threshold, it becomes screaming:
- it rejects rituals and enchantments
- it throws bones at nearby players, causing slowness
- it occasionally whispers or groans
- it loses all decoration, leaving only a spectral halo surrounded by moving glyphs
The grave must reduce its corruption to the minimum before it can be calmed and used again.
tombstone.compendium.dust_of_vanishing.d: The Dust of Vanishing allows an easy retreat by disappearing from the eyes of creatures in a cloud of smoke, and reappearing a few steps behind your old position.
tombstone.compendium.dust_of_frost.desc: The Dust Of Frost allows an easy retreat by creating a wall of snow powder, and teleports you a few steps behind your old position.
tombstone.compendium.enchantments.title: Enchantments
tombstone.compendium.enchantments.desc:
Corail Tombstone adds a number of enchantments.
Weapon enchantments can be applied to ranged weapons.
Potion effects can accumulate their duration.
The Config allows you to define whether these enchantments are available at the Enchanting Table.
The Book of Magic Impregnation also allows you to obtain enchantments on your equipment, as well as improve existing ones.
To configure the other settings of these enchantments, a datapack will be necessary since these are linked to the json data and the corresponding enchantment tags.
tombstone.compendium.soulbound.desc:
Items with this enchantment remain on you when you die.
The Book of Soulbound can also place a Soulbound Rune on an item that functions in the same way.
Slot: All
tombstone.compendium.spectral_bite.desc:
Each time you are hit, you have a chance to trigger Spectral Bite on all enemies around.
Slot: Feet
Chance: 5%% per level
Damage: 1 per level and the Wither effect for 5 seconds
tombstone.compendium.magic_siphon.desc:
Each hit to a creature steals part of a magical effect from the creature.
Slot: Weapon
Duration stolen: 30 seconds per level
tombstone.compendium.plague_bringer.desc:
Each hit to a creature applies a random harmful effect.
This enchantment is incompatible with Magic Siphon.
Slot: Weapon
Duration: 2 seconds per level
tombstone.compendium.curse_of_bones.desc:
Each time you are hit, you have a chance to receive the Bone Shield effect, reducing damage and reflecting part back to the attacker.
Slot: Chest
Chance: 10%% per level
Damage: 5%% per level of damage received
Duration: 3 seconds + 2 per level
tombstone.compendium.blessing.desc:
Each time you are hit, you have a chance to gain a beneficial effect.
Slot: Armor
Chance: 1%% per level
Duration: 2 seconds per level
tombstone.compendium.frostbite.desc:
Each hit to a creature applies a damaging and freezing effect.
Slot: Weapon
Duration: 4 seconds + 1 per level
Damage: 1 per level once frozen
tombstone.compendium.spectral_conjurer.d:
Each time you are hit, you have a chance to conjure a Spectral Wolf or increase the remaining time of a nearby Spectral Wolf.
Slot: Head
Chance: 5%% per level
Duration: 5 seconds per level
tombstone.compendium.incurable_wounds.de:
Each hit to a creature applies a healing-reducing effect.
Slot: Weapon
Healing Reduction: 10%% per level
Duration: 3 seconds + 2 per level
tombstone.compendium.decrepitude.desc:
Each hit to a creature applies an effect that reduces a percentage of health over time.
Damage is halved against players with bad alignment.
Undeads can't be affected by Decrepitude.
Slot: Weapon
Damage: 1%% per level every 2 seconds
Duration: 2 seconds per level
tombstone.compendium.sanctified.desc:
The weapon now deals holy damage and slightly regenerates health for a short time.
Holy damage ignores armor but is halved against players with good alignment.
Undead suffer healing effects that harm them.
Slot: Weapon
Regeneration duration: 1 second per level
Undead damage: 4 + 4 per 3 levels after the first
tombstone.compendium.ruthless_strike.des:
Increases critical damage.
Slot: Weapon
Critical damage: +15%% per level
tombstone.compendium.receptacle_of_famil:
This receptacle can capture the soul of one of your dead familiar and all its possessions.
The soul contained in the receptacle must then recover by slowly absorbing the vital essence of the wearer.
The most common use of the receptacle is to bring this familiar back to life by praying with the Ankh.
On dedicated servers, the Receptacle of Familiar can capture even if you're offline.
tombstone.compendium.fishing_rod_of_misa:
This fishing rod seems to be bad luck fishing.
Enchanting the item with a Grave Soul seems to worsen this bad luck.
tombstone.compendium.ghostly_shape.desc:
Ghostly Shape is an neutral effect received after a death that prevents creatures from attacking you, slowing falls, negating harmful effects and damage received, and grants True Sight.
The duration of the effect is reduced to 10 seconds when teleporting with a Grave Key (configurable) and to 5 seconds when pickup items from a grave.
The effect is canceled if you attack a creature, open a chest, break a block, or push a hostile creature.
The Essence of Undeath is a crafting ingredient to build Decorative Graves.
It can be dropped rarely from the undead creatures, by fishing in deep water or with cat morning gifts.
tombstone.compendium.grave_dust.desc:
The Grave Dust is a crafting ingredient used in several recipes such as Grave Marble, Scrolls and Tablets.
It can be dropped from the undead creatures, with cat morning gifts and sometimes when the lost tablets break.
tombstone.compendium.grave_key.desc:
After you reappear from a death, you receive the Grave Key.
This allows you to locate your grave at a distance when you are in the same dimension.
The key can be enchanted with a Soul haunting a Decorative Grave, or by combining an Ender Pearl, allowing you to teleport directly to your grave.
The key has a chance to be directly enchanted defined in the config and adjusted by the Perk Jailer of 20 %% per level to reach 100 %%.
tombstone.compendium.grave_plate.desc:
The Memorial Plaque allows you to set a name on a Decorative Grave.
They can be switched if allowed in config. You need first to engrave the Memorial Plaque by using an anvil and an iron ingot.
tombstone.compendium.impregnated_diamond: Impregnated Diamond is an ingredient used in crafting Receptacle of Familiar.
tombstone.compendium.halloween.title: Halloween
tombstone.compendium.halloween.desc:
The Halloween events run from October 20 to November 3.
During the Halloween period:
- Grave Guardians exchanges new items and disguises themselves for the occasion
- some lollipops can drop from undead and Cat Morning Gift
- multiple Perks are increased
- the chance to get a Blue Soul is increased.
- ghosts appears during night to haunt players that don't pray on graves
- some advancements
- Decorative Graves have special decorations
tombstone.compendium.christmas.title: Christmas
tombstone.compendium.christmas.desc:
Christmas events take place during the month of December from the 6th.
During the Christmas period:
- Grave Guardians exchanges new items and disguises themselves for the occasion
- some lollipops can drop from undead and Cat Morning Gift
- multiple Perks are increased
- some advancements
- Decorative Graves have special decorations
tombstone.compendium.spring_bloom.title: Spring Bloom
tombstone.compendium.spring_bloom.desc:
Spring Bloom events takes place from March 10 to March 31.
During this period:
- Grave Guardians wear spring outfits and offer new trades
- Decorative Graves are surrounded by Thornveil, a rare and mysterious flower
- Several Perks are temporarily increased
- Event-exclusive advancements are available
- Decorative Graves are strewn with flowers
tombstone.compendium.christmas_gift.desc: The Christmas Gift can only be opened after December 24 and requires the use of a Grave Soul.
tombstone.compendium.villager_gift.desc:
The Villager Gift will only be delivered in time if you bring it to the villager's bed by following the particles showing you the direction.
A reward awaits you there.
tombstone.compendium.christmas_hat.desc:
The Christmas Hat can only be obtained by trading with Grave Guardian during the Christmas period.
It increases your movement speed and luck.
It can be magically enchanted at the enchanting table or with the Book of Magic Impregnation.
The Knowledge of Death is a list of unlockable Perks by progressing in by various ways:
- with the Ankh of Prayer
- by completing the advancements of Tombstone
- by enchanting items with Decorative Graves
- by releasing a Soul from a Receptacle of Soul.
The Knowledge of Death also increases the minimum time without sleeping for phantom to spawn near player by 10%% for each level (if the config allows it)
tombstone.compendium.lollipop.desc:
Halloween lollipops provide a random benefit.
It is possible to configure the effects that should not be granted in the config.
tombstone.compendium.lost_tablet.desc:
These tablets tend to be found by unlucky fishermen.
First, they must recover their energy.
Then, they can lead to remote villages, or rarer structures, or even in other worlds if config allows it.
The Perk Archeologist allows you to find rare structures more often.
Enhance the tablet with a Grave Soul can teleport to this place.
tombstone.compendium.magic_items.title: Magic Items
tombstone.compendium.magic_items.desc: Most Tombstone items can be enchanted with the help of Grave Soul that are haunting randomly Decorative Graves, by using the item on the grave with a right click.
tombstone.compendium.magic_scrolls.title: Magic Scrolls
tombstone.compendium.magic_scrolls.desc:
Once enchanted with a Grave Soul, they can provide an effect by holding the right mouse button, destroying the scroll at the same time.
The duration of the scrolls can be defined in config.
tombstone.compendium.magic_tablets.title: Magic Tablets
tombstone.compendium.magic_tablets.desc:
Once enchanted, they allow to teleport in various ways.
In ancient time, tablets had the ability to transport multiple creatures, but not one remembers the secret of their creation.
tombstone.compendium.magic_books.title: Magic Books
tombstone.compendium.magic_books.desc:
They must be used in offhand, with the aid of a Grave Soul, in order to apply their effect to the item in the main hand.
The book is destroyed when the effect occurs.
The perk Scribe enhances the effect of books.
tombstone.compendium.perk.title: Perks
tombstone.compendium.perk.desc: Perks are bonuses related to the Tombstone features that can be obtained with your Knowledge of Death points.
tombstone.compendium.prayer.title: Prayer
tombstone.compendium.prayer.desc:
The Ankh allows you to use prayers by period.
You can pray near a Decorative Grave giving you a chance to receive a beneficial effect (configurable) or on certain creatures depending on your alignment.
If your alignment is neutral or better, you can use Exorcism to convert a zombie-villager into a villager (or Zombify doing the opposite if your alignment is negative.
If your alignment is +1, you can use Prayer of Protection on a villager (or citizen of Minecolonies) preventing its next death.
If your alignment is +2, you can use Prayer of Empathy to rally a tamable creature.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_feather_f: This scroll gives you an effect slowing down your falls.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_knowledge:
This scroll is used to preserve your experience.
When you make contact with a Grave Soul, all your experience will be drained by the scroll.
Use again the scroll will restore this experience.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_preservat:
This scroll gives you an effect to keep your beneficial effects after a death.
It is possible to configure the effects that should not be restored in the config.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_purificat: This scroll gives you an effect to remove your negative effects throughout its duration.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_true_sigh:
This scroll lets you in the dark, in the fog and under the water.
It also reveals invisible creatures.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_unstable_: This scroll gives you an effect making you invulnerable for a full second every 5 seconds.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_reach.des: This scroll gives you an effect increasing the range to hit creatures or to harvest.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_lightning: This scroll reduces damage taken by lightning by 75%.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_frost_res: This scroll reduces damage taken by frost by 75%.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_aquatic_l: This scroll allows you to move freely and breathe in the water.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_mercy.des: This scroll allows you to share your beneficial effects among your nearby allies.
tombstone.compendium.scroll_of_projectil: This scroll allows you to return projectiles to their owner.
tombstone.compendium.soul.title: Grave Soul
tombstone.compendium.soul.desc:
Some souls are sometimes condemned to wander the world of mortals, and end up haunting places like Decorative Graves.
These souls can help you, by activating the magic of some of your items, freeing them from their eternal destiny.
It's possible to find them trapped in a Receptacle of Soul.
Some souls are stronger and can provide an enhanced effect to the item.
tombstone.compendium.grave_guardian.desc:
Rarely, a Grave Guardian can appear near a Decorative Grave when a soul is going to appear (2.5% as for the Blue Soul).
This guardian will protect the surroundings from hostile creatures and will offer to trade with players.
During special events, exchanges can be different, it is a way to obtain the essence of undeath.
Some stories say that necromancers sometimes imprison souls in a receptacle to prevent them from dying.
Make freedom to these souls by bringing them back to a Decorative Grave gives 10 Death Knowledge Points.
It is possible to find out on undead bosses.
tombstone.compendium.special_bonus.title: Special Bonuses
tombstone.compendium.special_bonus.desc: Some bonuses are awarded at certain times of the year and other reasons necessary for the continuity of Tombstone.
tombstone.compendium.strange_scroll.desc: The Strange Scroll is used to craft Magic Scrolls by combining in inventory.
tombstone.compendium.strange_tablet.desc: The Strange Tablet is used to craft Magic Tablets by combining in inventory.
tombstone.compendium.tablet_of_assistanc:
The Tablet of Assistance allows you to teleport to a player.
For this, it must be enchanted with a Grave Soul and then the name of the player must be engraved with the Anvil and a Grave Dust.
tombstone.compendium.tablet_of_home.desc: The Tablet of Home allows you to teleport to your respawn point.
tombstone.compendium.tablet_of_recall.de: The Tablet of Recall allows you to teleport to a Decorative Grave.
The Tablet of Cupidity allows you to teleport to places where fortune could smile at you, but also bring your loss.
tombstone.compendium.tablet_of_guard.des: The Tablet of Guard allows to summon a Spectral Wolf to protect the place for a moment
tombstone.compendium.voodoo_poppet.desc:
The Voodoo Poppet protects the player from their next death, provided it has first been enchanted with a Grave Soul, sealing the magic that activates it.
The Witch Doctor Perk grants a chance to keep the Voodoo Poppet after activation, preventing its consumption.

readable_scroll.elyra_diary.author: Elyra
